root.name: ClayFighter: Sculptor's Cut
root.description: OverviewClayFighter: Sculptor's Cut is a 2D fighting game developed and released by Interplay for the Nintendo 64 on May 1, 1998. An enhanced version of ClayFighter 63â…“, the game was released as a rental-only exclusive for the Blockbuster Video shops. The game sacrifices the combo system and several character attacks for new stages and four new characters: Lady Liberty, High Five, Lockjaw Pooch, and Zappa Yow Yow Boyz.Due to its limited distribution (and poor treatment from being a rental game), ClayFighter: Sculptor's Cut is considered one of the rarest North American Nintendo 64 games.
